lead_paragraph: University of Miami quarterback Kyle Wright had surgery Monday to repair his fractured right thumb and is expected to miss the rest of the season. Coach Larry Coker said yesterday that there was a chance that Wright could return if Miami (5-5, 2-4 Atlantic Coast Conference) qualified for a bowl game, but he did not seem optimistic. Wright was injured Nov. 4 against Virginia Tech.
